page.title: 09A DAY IN DALE'S LIFE
page.content: Today I woke up at 7.00, had breakfast of cereal and orange juice, got ready and left for school at 8.40 for the 5 min. walk to school. When school began we walked up the corridor into the class and then went to assembly. After maths and P.E.it was dinner time. We had beefburgers, potato and gravy. We went outside for another game of rounders. After English lessons school finished at 3.30. I ran home, had my tea, went outside to play tennis for almost two hours then returned to play on my computer. I did my 350 piece jigsaw of a sailing ship which took me nearly all night. When I had finished I went to the fish and chip shop and bought a bag of chips for 26p. I ate my chips at home and went to bed at 10.00p.m.
